comment.raw:
/**
 * Accepts `rem`, `vw`, and `vh` css units, and returns the corresponding pixel value.
 *
 * @param str - A string containing a css unit.
 *
 * @param relativeParentSize - The size of the parent element, if the unit is `%`.
 *
 * @throws
 *
 * If the string is not a valid css unit.
 *
 * @example
 * ```ts
 * measure('1rem') // 16
 * measure('100vw') // 1920 (on a 1920x1080 screen)
 * ```
 *
 */
comment.summary: Accepts rem, vw, and vh css units, and returns the corresponding pixel value.

params.name: str
params.description: A string containing a css unit.

params.name: relativeParentSize
params.description: The size of the parent element, if the unit is`%`.

customBlocks.content: If the string is not a valid css unit.

blocks.content:
measure('1rem') // 16
measure('100vw') // 1920 (on a 1920x1080 screen)
